titleStmt.title: Our Saviours passion delivered in a sermon, preach'd in the cathedral church of Saint Peter in Exon. On Good Friday, the first of April, 1670. By Matthew Hole, Master of Arts, and Fellow of Exeter Colledge, Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Hole, Matthew, 1639 or 40-1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Royston, and are to be sold by Abisha Brocas bookseller in Exon,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
